articles.title: US space news: Odysseus spacecraft goes dormant on moon after lopsided landing | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Odysseus, the U.S. spacecraft, went dark on the moon after a flawed landing. Intuitive Machines received a farewell transmission and plans to reawaken it if solar power is sufficient. The spacecraft's operation was hindered by the landing
